article_title: Students interrupt UK Board of Trustees meeting to protest food services company
article_text: The University of Kentucky's usually staid board of trustees meeting was interrupted Tuesday by a group of students who oppose UK's planned outsourcing of its dining services.

article_metadata.news-keywords: kentucky, board, trustees, protest, dining, services, blackford, uk, students, against, sweatships, sodexo
